subject: Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: With 55 percent ownership of the Nets’ new arena, Bruce C. Ratner will have a stake in what could be a battlefront — downtown Brooklyn against Midtown Manhattan.
snippet: With 55 percent ownership of the Nets’ new arena, Bruce C. Ratner will have a stake in what could be a battlefront — downtown Brooklyn against Midtown Manhattan.
